title: Our stories
creator_contributor_role: Council of Australian Governments (COAG) Youth at Centre Project, partner
Academy of Sport Health and Education (ASHE), partner
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
abstract: A group of storytellers share their life stories
description: In collaboration with Koorie Heritage Trust, RMIT, Goulburn's Academy of Sport Health and Education (ASHE) and Council of Australian Governments (COAG) Youth at Centre Project, a group of storytellers share their life stories.
